name: Rolling Makeup Case with 4 Removable Bags, Professional Makeup Train Case with Wheels, Makeup Artist Travel Bag with Brushes Storage Section, Black (Patent Design)
short_description: 【PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP CASE】 The rolling makeup suitcase features double layers design to hold all makeup essentials. Upper compartment can be divided into 4 areas by 2 adhesive dividers. A mesh pocket in the top flap for keeping facial mask, samples, etc. (Empty bag only, NOT includes any supplies.)

【COSMETOLOGY BAG】 Bottom compartment comes with 4 individual zipper cases(9”x5.9”x2.4”) for easy classifying your cosmetics, skin-care products, nail polishes etc. Inside transparent pocket for keeping toiletry accessories.

【TOOLS ORGANIZER】 Side compartments contains 6 deep slots for holding different sizes of makeup brushes, eyebrow pencils, and other cosmetic supplies. Inside waterproof PVC material is easy to wipe clean.

【WELL MADE】 Prokva rolling makeup bag was made of heavy duty nylon fabric and thick padding to protect your cosmetics from dust and bumps. A removable board equipped for bottom support while holding the bag's shape.

【3 CARRYING OPTIONS】 Prokva makeup train case equipped with top handles and a detachable shoulder strap, ideal for a cosmetologist or makeup artist on the go. Upgraded detachable trolley features an extendable handle up to 36.8 inches and reinforced legs, makes it more comfortable to carry the cosmetic suitcase.
